def.dt: :a person who legally belongs to a country and has the rights and protection of that country She was a United States citizen but lived most of her life abroad. a group of Japanese citizens I've been treated like a second-class citizen. [=someone who is not given the same rights as other people]
:a person who lives in a particular place the citizens of Boston see also senior citizen
:an arrest made by a citizen rather than by the police
:an old person programs/activities for senior citizens :a person who is at least a certain age (such as 55) Senior citizens qualify for a discount at the movie theater.
